jd: Greetings from Sligo Software Solutions, Inc. !!SLIGO is a Software Development & IT Consulting company. We have an urgent requirement for Java Architect with FileNet position with our client. maintain Medical Disability Determinations and Tracking System to accommodate State takeover of Medicaid disability determinations.Duties The Systems Architect activities and responsibilities that applications through predefined test cases and quality control process.Working with ITS staff to program application.Mandatory Requirements Experience (14+ Years)Defines the architecture of a interfaces (including with the environment, especially the user), and the technologies and resources to be used in the design.Requirements This is an 100% Onsite84 months of Experience in Object Oriented Analysis and Design (OOAD) in designing and implementing Information Technology Solutions using the Java programming language.84 months of Experience advanced data querying capabilities and creating database objects like Tables, Stored Procedures, Views, Indexes, Triggers, Cursors, user defined data types and ERD diagrams with Oracle.84 months of Experience in developing Application utilizing FileNet/Captiva for document management.84 months of Experience using the following Java framework: Struts, Hibernate, Spring.72 months of Experience developing application on the Health
